channel.title: Client Coder
channel.description:
Hi Their. I'm Currently Under The Making of Southscape. The Server Is Going Quite well, But Only %3 Finished!
Because Im Coding, Im To Busy To Make a Client. The Server Name Is Southscape, So Most Things Should Say "Southscape Is Loading, Please Wait" Etc..
I also Need It So Theirs No Ip To Type In, You Can only Connect To Southscape with This Client. - This Is Not Required.
Their Should Be a Nice Background Picture, Or Someone Can Send Me The Blank Client & a Good Tutorial on How To Change The "Welcome To Southscape, Etc.."
Thanks, Gh0styscape.

item.title: Client Coder
item.dc:creator: @gh0styscape gh0styscape
item.description:
@gh0styscape wrote:

Hi Their.
I’m Currently Under The Making of Southscape. The Server Is Going Quite well, But Only %3 Finished!
